comments.body: Explain how the smart contract of your token is related to smart contracts and NFT? How is the process of submitting a share in the environmental projects you mentioned? How can I use your token to influence the environment? How do you technically implement the reward for using the token?I see a regular smart contract! regular token. Without any functionality. How can you comment on this?
